title: Want to upgrade T206 Young Bare Hand SGC35 to SGC40
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: Want to upgrade T206 Young Bare Hand SGC35 to SGC40
posts.post_content:
As a collector of only 40s, I was a little bummed when I saw my Cy Young Bare Hand came back as an 'oh so close' 35.  If any one has a 40 and wouldn't mind a minor downgrade let me know and we can work out a deal.  The card is on it's way back from SGC... hope to have it Wednesday.

-erick
